channel.title: ComplexD tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ComplexD.

item.description: Five Great Reads on Cyber, Data, and Legal Discovery for March 2022 - Read the complete newsletter at https://t.co/VVtOrFEt77. #Cybersecurity #InformationGovernance #eDiscovery https://t.co/FcS7Mg1CIx

A New Data #Privacy Framework? A European Commission and United States Joint Statement - Read the complete announcement at https://t.co/8ezqiSK1Bm. #DataProtection #eDiscovery @EU_Commission https://t.co/QY4jzF2nvu
